availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Mercer County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Joseph Robb and Nancy Robb. Married to Lucy Ann Coleman Robb in Mercer County on August 24, 1860. Father of Mary Robb, Jessy Lou Robb, and Matty Sue Robb. Farmer in Mercer County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jessamine County, p. 22.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedule, Kentucky, Mercer County, Precinct 7, p. 13.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Mercer County Marriages, Film #000191864.
Find A Grave, "J. M. Robb (July 14, 1831-December 12, 1895)," Memorial #154660107, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/154660107 (accessed June 27, 2018).
